VS.Net: Trim EOL White Space

July 2007 · blogger, frogsbrain, republished, wayback

Originally published on Blogger on July 23, 2007. View original article.

Archive note: Originally published on frogsbrain.blogspot.com. Republished from local Wayback snapshot exports.

Regular expressions are great. Little strings of yummy helpfulness.

Here's a little regex that can be used to trim all some or all of your trailing whitespace.

:b+$

Just pass nothing for the replacement.
